entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint Andrews
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:26 AM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 07:00 AM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -12.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -14.4°C
Wind: NNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 5.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 14 except minus 8 along parts of the coast.
